subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: A Major League Soccer expansion team set to open in 2018 plans to build a $250 million, 22,000-seat stadium next to Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum.
snippet: A Major League Soccer expansion team set to open in 2018 plans to build a $250 million, 22,000-seat stadium next to Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum.
